name: Buenos_Aires_device
text:
Buenos Aires device
An unidentified device was active somewhere in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
History
After a frustrating telephone call with Gene and Jake, Lorraine sent the message "2" to her contact "ARGENT." Shortly after, the device rang and its two red lights flashed twice.
After Dale Cooper's doppelganger set off and stopped the Yankton Federal Prison's alarms with a phone call, the device rang and flashed before almost completely disintegrating.
